description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In the cheesiest story line I could manage, Harry Kersey, ex cop, avenges his brutal wife's death, on a rampage across the streets of down town Farlix upon Trent.  Where Harry takes vengeance on the criminals responsible, with the help from the local police force who often turn a blind eye or offer a power up.
description.short: In the cheesiest story line I could manage, Harry Kersey, ex cop, avenges his brutal wife's death, on a rampage across the streets of down town Farlix upon Trent.  Where Harry takes vengeance on the criminals responsible, with the help from the local police force who often turn a blind eye or offer a power up.
